item.description:
Please arrive at Nashoba River Paddlers early (3:30-4:00) if you will be renting. We will start paddling at 4:30. Woohoo!

http://www.nashobapaddler.com/pages/welcome.html

Nashoba Paddler, LLC
978-448-8699
diane@nashobapaddler.com

Discover a rich paddling environment just one hour northwest of Boston in the rolling Nashoba Valley! The famous, restored Nashua River and its winding tributaries are a treasure of north central Massachusetts. Nashoba Paddler's rental base is located on the river in a beautiful location you won't believe is in your own backyard! Not only will you have fun and get exercise and fresh air, but we hope we can help you come away with a better understanding and appreciation of the river. Come visit our family-owned, family-friendly business. There's something for everyone!

 

OPEN May - October

SPRING (May 1- June 19): Weekends & Holidays - 9:30 a.m. to 6:30 p.m. Weekdays by appointment
SUMMER (June 20 - September 3): DAILY 9:30 a.m. to 6:30 p.m. (until 8:00 p.m. on Fridays)
FALL (September 4 - October 31): Weekends & Holidays - 9:30 a.m. to 6:30 p.m. Weekdays by appointment

 

*Payment by CASH or CHECK only*

WEEKEND  and HOLIDAY Canoe & Kayak Rental Rates
Boat Type Per Hour Day

Canoe $16/1st hour, $14.00/additional hour $51
Solo Kayak $15/1st hour, $14.00/additional hour $49
Double Kayak $18/1st hour, $14.00/additional hour $53
Giant Canoe $28/1st hour, $26.00/additional hour $93

WEEKDAY Canoe & Kayak Rental Rates
Boat Type Per Hour Day

Canoe $15/1st hour, $13.50/additional hour $46
Solo Kayak $14/1st hour, $13.50/additional hour $44
Double Kayak $17/1st hour, $13.50/additional hour $47
Giant Canoe $27/1st hour, $25/additional hour $88

 There is a $7.00 charge if you have your own kayak.

GENERAL RENTAL RULES

  1. Liability Release Form must be signed by all participants. Minors, under 18 yrs., must have a parent sign our liability release form.
  2. Person Flotation Device (lifejacket) MUST be worn at all times in boats.
  3. NO ALCOHOL or other substances which impair judgement.

group.name: Northern Central MA, Southern NH Hiking Group

item.name: Let's paddle down the Nashua River....
